DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to determine the influence of the periodontal diseases in patients giving pre-term birth in the maternity hospital of Nantes. A French population is observed. The clinical, bacteriological and microbiological aspects will confirmed a comparative study which aim is dental prevention in the beginning of the pregnancy to avoid premature delivery.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study of the Influence of Periodontal Diseases on Pre-term Birth: Observation in the Maternity Hospital of Nantes
DOC.criteria: Women older than 18 Preterm birth between 24 and 37 gestational weeks Patient's opposition Delivery before 24 gestational weeks or after 37 gestational weeks
DOC.keyword: Active periodontal disease with sulcular bleeding index
